Asking Language

Preference

Which question is the best way to ask about language preference? Drag your choice to the text bubble:

Which question is the best way to ask about language preference? Drag your choice to the text bubble:

Do you speak English well?

Would you prefer to speak to our staff in English or some other language?

In what language do you prefer to discuss your health care?                            

In what language do you prefer to discuss your health care?

I prefer Spanish, thanks.

Did you remember that The Joint Commission provides you a recommended way to ask patients about their language preference?

 

Even if your patient appears to speak English well, always ask the question.
